# Etherscan_API

result = GetResult('Ethereum address', 'Etherscan API KEY')

print(result.get_erc20_balance())

return balance your erc20 token ETH address

result = GetResult('Ethereum address', 'Etherscan API KEY')

print(result.get_eth_balance())

return balance your ETH address
